name: Pineapple Salsa
description: This pineapple salsa with lime and cilantro is the perfect addition to your next BBQ! Or serve it with tortilla chips for a delicious snack or appetizer. It's very easy to make, fresh, and packed with flavor!

recipeInstructions.text: Start by making the pineapple bowl. Cut about 1/3 of a fresh pineapple off using a sharp knife.
recipeInstructions.name: Start by making the pineapple bowl. Cut about 1/3 of a fresh pineapple off using a sharp knife.

recipeInstructions.text: With a sharp knife, make a cut around the edge of the pineapple to make the pineapple bowl. Be careful not to cut through the bottom of the pineapple.
recipeInstructions.name: With a sharp knife, make a cut around the edge of the pineapple to make the pineapple bowl. Be careful not to cut through the bottom of the pineapple.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the pineapple into six pieces. Carefully use a spoon to remove the pineapple pieces. Congrats, you've got a pineapple bowl!

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the removed pineapple pieces, the tomatoes, and the bell pepper into small pieces. Finely chop the red onions and the cilantro.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine all ingredients for the pineapple salsa and stir in the lime juice. Season with salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes. Serve the pineapple salsa in the pineapple bowl.
